attributes.action: zero rate or refund VAT paid on flood defence systems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No grants are available to private property owners for flood defences.  The cost of installing floodgates or barriers is increased because VAT has to be paid as well.  VAT should not have to be paid to protect one's home from flooding and I petition the Government to put this matter right and make all flood defences VAT free.
